Room.Name: Oceanview Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Oceanview Drive, east of Dillsdale Memorial Park and west of the Dragon Tooth Inn. Hillcrest Drive is to the south.
Room.LongDescription: The Dragon Tooth Inn is located to the east of Oceanview Drive. This is one of the more luxurious Inns in Oceancrest, and is heavily guarded at all times, for the protection of the guests. Although crime isn't a major concern in this part of town, the presense of security guards makes the customer's stays more relaxing. Royalty also stays here.
